sentences.en: For our dining room I have chosen ochre yellow walls.
sentences.cn: 我决定把我们餐厅的墙壁刷成赭黄色。

sentences.en: Green and yellow lights blinked on the surface of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 海港的水面上闪烁着绿色和黄色的灯光。

sentences.en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

sentences.en: I'm sure that yellow lead matched up to that yellow socket.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定那根黄线接那个黄色插口。

sentences.en: Kippers are dyed yellow to make them more appetizing.
sentences.cn: 烟熏鲱鱼被腌成了黄色，令人垂涎欲滴。

sentences.en: She had pale thin yellow hair she pulled back into a bun.
sentences.cn: 她把一头稀疏的浅黄色头发向后梳，挽成了个圆髻。

sentences.en: Sheep were munching their way through a yellow carpet of leaves.
sentences.cn: 绵羊边吃边走，穿行在厚厚的一层黄色落叶中间。

sentences.en: Some fog warning signs had been put up with flashing yellow lights.
sentences.cn: 一些配有黄色闪光灯的大雾警示标志立了起来。

sentences.en: Staff will be issued with new grey-and-yellow designer uniforms.
sentences.cn: 将会向雇员发放灰黄相间的名牌新制服。

sentences.en: Steve Vickers was yellow-carded for a foul on Hunt.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫·维克斯因对亨特犯规被出示黄牌。

sentences.en: The band was playing far off in their blue and yellow uniforms.
sentences.cn: 乐队身穿蓝黄相间的队服正在远处演奏。

sentences.en: The cables are all bright yellow to prevent you tripping over them.
sentences.cn: 电缆都是亮黄色，以防绊倒人。

sentences.en: The flowers are bronzy in bud and bright yellow when open.
sentences.cn: 这些花的花蕾是青铜色，开放后呈明黄色。

sentences.en: The living room was tinged yellow by light filtered through the curtains.
sentences.cn: 起居室被透过窗帘照进来的阳光染上了一丝金黄色。

sentences.en: The petals can be cooked with rice to colour it yellow.
sentences.cn: 可以把这些花瓣跟米饭一起煮，使米饭变成黄色。

sentences.en: The room was decorated in a variety of reds, blues, and yellows.
sentences.cn: 房间以深浅不一的红色、蓝色和黄色装饰。

sentences.en: Yellow doesn’t suit me at all
Yellow doesn’t suit me at all.

words.tran_cn: [光]黄色；黄种人；[染料]黄色颜料

phrases.tran_cn: (冒犯)黄祸（指中国人或东南亚民族造成的政治、军事威胁）
黄页（国际上对商业电话号码薄的固定称谓）

trans.tran_en: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
to become yellow or make something become yellow
